arts.ttl: Antony joins Real Betis on loan until end of season
arts.sum: Manchester United winger Antony joins La Liga side Real Betis on loan until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Man United forward Antony joins Real Betis on loan
arts.sum: Manchester United winger Antony completed a loan move to Real Betis on Saturday that will keep him at the Spanish club for the rest of the season. Brazil international Antony was a $95 million signing from Ajax in 2022 and expected to be a leading light for United.

arts.ttl: Antony joins Real Betis on loan until end of season
arts.sum: Manchester United winger Antony joins La Liga side Real Betis on loan until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid star to miss Mallorca clash
arts.sum: La Liga high-flyers Atlético Madrid will be forced to make do with a leading member of the club’s midfield ranks for their next outing. This comes owing to developments in…

arts.ttl: Man Utd winger Antony joins Real Betis on loan
arts.sum: Real Betis have signed Manchester United winger Antony on loan for the remainder of the season, subject to international clearance.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Man Utd confirm Antony exit with 'unique transfer clause' included in deal
arts.sum: Brazilian winger Antony has been an unmitigated disaster at Manchester United since a mega-money move from Ajax and he has already been shown the exit door at Old Trafford

arts.ttl: Antony gives five-word verdict on Real Betis loan move as £81m Man United flop arrives in Spain to finalise deal
arts.sum: Manchester United winger Antony has given his verdict on his loan move to Real Betis. The 24-year-old has arrived in Spain as he prepares to finalise his switch to the LaLiga club.

arts.ttl: Antony breaks silence on Man United exit with five-word verdict on Real Betis loan
arts.sum: Manchester United attacker Antony is "so happy" to be temporarily ending his Red Devils nightmare with a loan move to Real Betis.

arts.ttl: Antony set for Real Betis medical as Manchester United exit nears
arts.sum: The Brazilian looks set for a loan move to La Liga after falling out of favour under Ruben Amorim
